> A(a team manager) : How are you doing with your Blender project? > B(a designer) : I'm enjoying it, but it's taking a long time for me to complete >                           my weekly tasks. > A : **`You're learning the ropes.` Once you get the hang of it,** >      I'm sure it won't take a long time. > B : I hope so ! > > üí° **get the hang of something : Í∞êÏùÑ Ïû°Îã§. Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÑ ÌÑ∞ÎìùÌïòÎã§.**
